text: The Hyundai Genesis Coupe is a sports car made by Hyundai Motor Company. It was first released on October 13, 2008, in South Korea. This car was Hyundai's first rear-wheel drive sports coupe, and it shares a platform with the Hyundai Genesis. The Genesis Coupe was sold in various markets, including North America and the Middle East. In the United States, it became available in February 2009. Hyundai designed the car to compete with models like the Infiniti G37. In 2011 it suffred a facelift and In 2016, the Genesis Coupe was discontinued after the brand Genesis became a separate luxury division of Hyundai. == References == Category:Sports cars Genesis Coupe
title: Hyundai Genesis Coupe
